content:
Here are a few prompt suggestions for sending an audio clip with Gujarati speech from an enlightened master explaining to seekers to the Whisper API:

1. "Gujarati speech from an enlightened master guiding seekers on their path"
2. "Audio clip featuring an enlightened master's teachings in Gujarati for seekers"
3. "Whisper API prompt for a clip with spiritual guidance in Gujarati by an enlightened master"
4. "Enlightened master's discourse in Gujarati for seekers, suitable for Whisper API"
5. "Sending Gujarati audio from an enlightened master with guidance for seekers to the Whisper API"
